definition[0]: (1975-) a US film actress who is known for being very beautiful and for being in a relationship with the US actor Brad Pitt. She is the daughter of the actor Jon Voight. She has won four Golden Globe awards for George Wallace (1998), Gia (1999), Girl, Interrupted (2000), and A Mighty Heart (2008). She has also won an Academy Award for Girl, Interrupted and two Emmy awards (for George Wallace and Gia).
